message: @equinox Well in that case, shoot me an email dude and we can talk more later :)
What if I am not an iphone dev but interested?
@chrisnet how about just create a new group on convore so we can talk privately?
@chrisnet I am an iOS developer and looking for some work to do, currently I am working on the convore for iPhone.. interested?

@lapchan Thanks man - As of right now, we need an iPhone dev. We are keeping the idea simple, so that we can freaking launch it quick. Perhaps, after we launch. See where the idea goes. Either way shoot us an email.
@chrisnet well.. the convore app is kind of going slowly... there's no target of when it needs to be done.. it's my personal project that I am working on
@equinox i will message you soon with an invite
